meta.description: Context Sensitive Help (CSH) for table tx_sbportfolio2_domain_model_imagefolder

languageKey.label: The image folder's title. Used in the FE and in table listings in the BE.
An alternative title for use in the FE.
An alternative title for use in the FE when space is restricted.
The actual folders associated with this image folder record. These are references to folders in fileadmin.
A short description about this image folder.
The date that this image folder should start showing up in the FE.
The date that this image folder should stop showing up in the FE.
